May contain traces of soy, milk, peanuts & tree nuts***".
reason_for_recall: Ingredients statement declares Unsalted Cream but does not list milk.  Label has allergen advisory statement "Mfg on same equipment that processes wheat, egg, peanut & tree nut.  May contain traces of soy, milk, peanuts & tree nuts".
The firm was notified by the FDA that the product contains the unapproved food additive 1,4-dimethylamylamine (DMAA).
